Reviews.Title: “Great location for Paris”
Reviews.Author: MyFamily512
Reviews.Content: spent nights whilst visiting paris children chose executive apartment additional bed space limited location excellent staff helpful friendly excellent choice families moderm kitchen sized fitted bathroom definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A good nights sleep in Paris is possible”
Reviews.Author: Ian_9
Reviews.Content: third visit management manage improve hotel time visit gift od glace fruits coffe tea bags provided pleasurable innovations lcd tv yes bed heaved wall designed cavernous addition kitchen dining table positioning quietest throughfare paris excellent stay enables pot real coffee pop buy fresh start day refreshed pace own wise lunch dont eat night pop raod galleries lafayette gourmet grab snack eat front tv highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “To have your own apartment in Paris”
Reviews.Author: Bea0403
Reviews.Content: ive citadines husband kids ages 13 11 5 picked bedroom apartment nice duplex sofa bed living roomwith functional equiped kitchen wc salle de bain teenage boys loved privacy hotel little girl loved house paris breakfast dinner light living wich little bit days cleaning wasnt perfect called front desk solved staff nice helpful located walking nice

Reviews.Title: “Well located but very pricey for a very small apartment”
Reviews.Author: nandi64
Reviews.Content: stayed aparthotel 3 nights august centrally located hotel spend days 2 sisters lives bali canada booked bedroom apartment clean tidy slept sofa bed okay walk bedroom bathroom privacy cramped 4 people pretty cramped 3 anyway nice quiet street centrally located friendly staff overall bit disappointing pricey

Reviews.Title: “Good location, service, internet and transportation.”
Reviews.Author: NickTravel2000
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 8 nights teenage daughter onebedroom nice 2 separate internet wifi codes expired couple times stay renewed business center restaurant codes able print boarding pass flight east connection airport cdg roissy bus corner rue scribe stop hourand strike actions terminal 2a arrival cdg 55 euros monoprix street front hotel la madeleine supermarket nearby laundry basement 9 euros didnt try hotel restaurant minikitchen fine dishwasher difficult

Reviews.Title: “Quiet comfortable apart hotel in central Paris”
Reviews.Author: Kozano
Reviews.Content: stayed vendome 2 nights late 1 baby stay stayed hotels paris time apart hotel picked due location reviews quiet hotel lobby service adequate courteous apartment plainly comfortably furnished kitchen kitchen separate bedrooms living baby toilet clean tastefully furnished bedrooms bit actually compared stayed paris considered spacious quiet traffic street cafe downstairs noisy windows soundproofed baby 2 peaceful sleeps thanks quiet hotel banging doors traffic blackout blinds purposes separate bedrooms quiet central location adequate kitchen perfect decor bland comfortable complaints hotel breakfast 17euros pp cafes weather beautiful chose eat

HotelInfo.Name: Citadines Paris Opera Vendome
HotelInfo.Address: 2, rue Edouard VII | 9th Arr., 75009 Paris, France
